item.earth.flinging_potion.effect.turtle: Flinging Potion of the Turtle Master
enchantment.earth.crumble.desc: Increases damage against Earthen mobs - Breaking blocks may yield different rewards
enchantment.earth.force.desc: Increases the speed/distance which shots are flung from the Flingshot
enchantment.earth.precision.desc: Increases the accuracy of the Flingshot
enchantment.earth.automation.desc: Allows the Flingshot to fire automatically when fully drawn
enchantment.earth.versatility.desc: Allows the Flingshot to fling item drops
advancement.earth.breed_carboranea.title: It's Getting Hot
advancement.earth.crumble_enchantment.de: Obtain a Crumble pickaxe, and discover its destructive properties
advancement.earth.deflect_pounce.title: Too Clingy
advancement.earth.deflect_pounce.desc: Deflect a Rubro's Pounce with a shield
advancement.earth.deflect_powerful_pounc: Deflect a charged up Deepslate Rubro's Pounce, then say sorry to your shield
advancement.earth.enter_grease_splat.des: Dip your feet in Glow Grease
advancement.earth.escort_pertilyo.title: Escort or Kidnap Mission?
advancement.earth.escort_pertilyo.desc: Using a Lead, bring a Pertilyo from the deepest depths to the surface
advancement.earth.feed_rubro.title: Have some, Bro
advancement.earth.find_carboranea.title: Den, it's tiny!
advancement.earth.find_carboranea.desc: Find a Carboranea inside its Coal Den
advancement.earth.break_fossil.title: What a Bizarre Fossil
advancement.earth.break_fossil.desc: Break a Redstone Fossil, and consider using a Crumble pickaxe next time
advancement.earth.break_rare_fossil.desc: Break an even rarer Redstone Fossil, and feel the satisfaction
advancement.earth.find_all_fossils.title: Gotta Break Them All!!
advancement.earth.find_all_fossils.desc: Break every Redstone Fossil variant, and question your sanity
advancement.earth.flinging_potion_witch_: Fling a potion at a witch from at least 32 blocks away
advancement.earth.grow_up_rubro.title: They Grow So Fast...
advancement.earth.grow_up_rubro.desc: Power a Fossilized Rubro until its fully grown
advancement.earth.hurt_rubro.title: Cool down, Cool down!
advancement.earth.hurt_rubro.desc: Attack a Rubro, then keep calm
advancement.earth.hit_pertilyo_with_copp: Fling a Copper Buck at a Pertilyo
advancement.earth.kill_creeper_with_shim: Pulverize a Creeper using a Shimmer Shell
Let your Rubro take out one of its rude peers
advancement.earth.kill_with_pickaxe.desc: Slay an Earthen creature using a pickaxe, that's how you do it!
advancement.earth.kill_with_rubro.title: Bonding Time
advancement.earth.kill_with_rubro.desc: Spend some time with your Rubro, by having it hunt with the help of a Madder Buck.
advancement.earth.obtain_bottled_rubia.d: Fill an empty bottle with Rubia, through right-clicking a powered Rubro with it.
advancement.earth.obtain_flingshot.title: Shoot, finally
advancement.earth.obtain_redstone.title: Look Out for Yourself
advancement.earth.obtain_redstone.desc: Keep your ear down to the ground, you may have upset somebody
advancement.earth.obtain_sickness_linger: Obtain a Lingering Potion of Sickness
advancement.earth.pertilyo_struck_by_lig: Assist a Pertilyo's.. electrifying deoxidation (from a safe distance)
advancement.earth.reach_deepslate.title: So Below
advancement.earth.reach_deepslate.desc: Reach the Deepslate layer of the world
advancement.earth.root.title: Earthbounds
advancement.earth.scoop_carboranea.title: A Bucket of Carbonara
advancement.earth.scoop_carboranea.desc: Scoop up a Carboranea with a bucket
advancement.earth.shoot_glow_grease_at_b: Use Glow Grease from afar to light up a dark area
advancement.earth.use_amethyst_dust.desc: Obtain and use some Amethyst Dust, with the help of a Crumble pickaxe
origin.earth.rubian.name: Rubian
origin.earth.rubian.description: Rubians are redstone powered creatures. As such they must consume redstone to survive, and do not require food. Additionally, they are in good terms with other Rubian creatures.
power.earth.power_food_replacement.name: Redstone Powered
power.earth.power_food_replacement.descr: You are powered by Redstone Foods, changing your attributes based on your power level.
power.earth.fall_resistance.name: Fall Resistance
power.earth.fall_resistance.description: You take 25% reduced damage from falls
power.earth.rubian_start.name: Rubian Heritage
power.earth.rubian_start.description: You start your journey with a Fossilized Rubro, 64 Redstone and 8 Primordial Redstone.
power.earth.only_redstone_food.name: Tough Stomach
power.earth.only_redstone_food.descripti: You can only eat Redstone Foods.
power.earth.rubian_cuisine.name: Rubian Cuisine
power.earth.rubian_cuisine.description: You've got access to special Redstone Food recipes.
power.earth.no_swimming.name: Dense Body
power.earth.no_swimming.description: Due to your weight, you are unable to swim.
power.earth.bound_to_earth.name: Bound to Earth
power.earth.bound_to_earth.description: You are weak to the Crumble Enchantment
power.earth.shoot_madder_buck.name: Madder Buck
power.earth.shoot_madder_buck.descriptio: Using 2 redstone (hunger) points, you can shoot a Madder Buck.
